title: Trump campaign fires back at 'preposterous' Harris border wall narrative post media report: 'Total bulls**t'
content: The Trump campaign dismisses reports suggesting Vice President Kamala Harris has softened her stance on border wall construction. Despite backing a bipartisan border security bill, the campaign insists Harris remains opposed to the wall. Trump senior adviser Jason Miller strongly denies any change in her position, characterizing the allegations as untrue.
summary: The Trump campaign dismisses reports suggesting Vice President Kamala Harris has softened her stance on border wall construction. Despite backing a bipartisan border security bill, the campaign insists Harris remains opposed to the wall. Trump senior adviser Jason Miller strongly denies any change in her position, characterizing the allegations as untrue.

title: US mother handcuffed 6-year-old son, let Pitbull attack him as punishment
content: A mother and three others were arrested after a 6-year-old boy in Savannah, Ohio, was seriously injured in a pit bull attack while restrained with handcuffs on his hands and feet as a form of "corporal punishment," according to the Ashland County Sheriff's Office. The boy sustained bites to his neck and ear and was promptly airlifted to the hospital for treatment.
summary: A mother and three others were arrested after a 6-year-old boy in Savannah, Ohio, was seriously injured in a pit bull attack while restrained with handcuffs on his hands and feet as a form of "corporal punishment," according to the Ashland County Sheriff's Office. The boy sustained bites to his neck and ear and was promptly airlifted to the hospital for treatment.

title: US baking influencer criticized for in-flight bread-making: 'It’s a plane, not a cooking class!'
Trump staff 'verbally abused and pushed official', claims Arlington National Cemetery
content: Two of Donald Trump's campaign staff members allegedly had a 'verbal and physical altercation' with an Arlington National Cemetery official during Trump's visit to honour servicemembers lost in the 2021 Afghanistan withdrawal. Trump’s campaign denies the accusations, citing interference by a visitor. Arlington National Cemetery confirmed the incident and has filed a report.
summary: Two of Donald Trump's campaign staff members allegedly had a 'verbal and physical altercation' with an Arlington National Cemetery official during Trump's visit to honour servicemembers lost in the 2021 Afghanistan withdrawal. Trump’s campaign denies the accusations, citing interference by a visitor. Arlington National Cemetery confirmed the incident and has filed a report.

title: 'Yell at me, if ...': Elon Musk responds to Zuckerberg’s regret over Covid-19 censorship
content: Elon Musk reiterated the significance of supporting diverse viewpoints on social media after Mark Zuckerberg expressed regret for censoring Covid-19 content under pressure from the Biden administration. This disclosure ignited political debates, with former President Trump using it to bolster his claims regarding the 2020 election.
summary: Elon Musk reiterated the significance of supporting diverse viewpoints on social media after Mark Zuckerberg expressed regret for censoring Covid-19 content under pressure from the Biden administration. This disclosure ignited political debates, with former President Trump using it to bolster his claims regarding the 2020 election.

title: 'Duty to warn': Canadian police alert aide to slain Sikh separatist Nijjar of increased threats
content: Canadian police have issued a warning to Inderjeet Singh Gosal, an aide to the assassinated Sikh separatist leader Hardeep Singh Nijjar, due to increased threats. Nijjar’s assassination has spurred controversy, with allegations about potential Indian government involvement. Canada’s police have charged four individuals, while India denies any role. The FBI is investigating other related threats.
summary: Canadian police have issued a warning to Inderjeet Singh Gosal, an aide to the assassinated Sikh separatist leader Hardeep Singh Nijjar, due to increased threats. Nijjar’s assassination has spurred controversy, with allegations about potential Indian government involvement. Canada’s police have charged four individuals, while India denies any role. The FBI is investigating other related threats.

title: Is droplets a source of Mpox transmission? What we know so far
content: The World Health Organization emphasizes that mpox is chiefly transmitted through close physical contact, rather than respiratory droplets. The Democratic Republic of Congo faces outbreaks involving Clade 1a and Clade 1b variants. Ongoing studies aim to better understand the transmission and severity of the new Clade 1b.
summary: The World Health Organization emphasizes that mpox is chiefly transmitted through close physical contact, rather than respiratory droplets. The Democratic Republic of Congo faces outbreaks involving Clade 1a and Clade 1b variants. Ongoing studies aim to better understand the transmission and severity of the new Clade 1b.

title: Japan on high alert as Typhoon Shanshan nears with torrential rain and gusty winds
content: Japan is bracing for Typhoon Shanshan, expected to bring severe weather, including heavy rain and strong winds. Airlines like ANA and Japan Airlines have cancelled numerous domestic flights, and some bullet trains are suspended. The storm is expected to hit Kyushu island and possibly reach central and eastern areas, including Tokyo. Authorities advise caution.
summary: Japan is bracing for Typhoon Shanshan, expected to bring severe weather, including heavy rain and strong winds. Airlines like ANA and Japan Airlines have cancelled numerous domestic flights, and some bullet trains are suspended. The storm is expected to hit Kyushu island and possibly reach central and eastern areas, including Tokyo. Authorities advise caution.

title: Nancy Pelosi’s raw response to January 6 riot: 'Trump got to pay a price’, unreleased footage shows
content: Unreleased footage from January 7, 2021, portrays former House Speaker Nancy Pelosi condemning Trump post-Capitol riot. Captured by her daughter and shared with the House Committee, it highlights Pelosi’s immediate outrage and her determination to hold Trump accountable. The footage also reveals Pelosi's frustration over security lapses and chaotic evacuation.
summary: Unreleased footage from January 7, 2021, portrays former House Speaker Nancy Pelosi condemning Trump post-Capitol riot. Captured by her daughter and shared with the House Committee, it highlights Pelosi’s immediate outrage and her determination to hold Trump accountable. The footage also reveals Pelosi's frustration over security lapses and chaotic evacuation.

title: Heat advisory and severe storms hit Michigan's Lansing: Over 16,000 without power, weather warnings in effect
content: A heat advisory has been issued in Lansing due to a late-summer heatwave, with temperatures in the low 90s and high humidity making it feel like 105 degrees. Severe storms are expected to bring damaging winds, rain, and hail. Power outages affect over 16,100 customers.
summary: A heat advisory has been issued in Lansing due to a late-summer heatwave, with temperatures in the low 90s and high humidity making it feel like 105 degrees. Severe storms are expected to bring damaging winds, rain, and hail. Power outages affect over 16,100 customers.

title: North Korea test-fires rocket launcher with new 'guiding system'
content: North Korea's Kim Jong Un supervised a test-firing of a 240mm multiple rocket launcher equipped with a new guiding system. This activity is part of North Korea's broader initiative to strengthen its military capabilities. The US and South Korea have alleged that Pyongyang has been supplying Russia with missiles. Tensions between the Koreas are at a high point.
summary: North Korea's Kim Jong Un supervised a test-firing of a 240mm multiple rocket launcher equipped with a new guiding system. This activity is part of North Korea's broader initiative to strengthen its military capabilities. The US and South Korea have alleged that Pyongyang has been supplying Russia with missiles. Tensions between the Koreas are at a high point.

title: Is Elon Musk’s SpaceX reign over? Rocket Lab’s Neutron set to rival Falcon 9 in 2025
content: Peter Beck, CEO of Rocket Lab, plans to introduce the Neutron rocket in mid-2025 as a direct competitor to SpaceX's Falcon 9. This new rocket aims to offer partially reusable cargo transportation at a lower cost. Beck's goal is to balance the market and facilitate satellite launches, marking a significant challenge to Elon Musk's SpaceX.
summary: Peter Beck, CEO of Rocket Lab, plans to introduce the Neutron rocket in mid-2025 as a direct competitor to SpaceX's Falcon 9. This new rocket aims to offer partially reusable cargo transportation at a lower cost. Beck's goal is to balance the market and facilitate satellite launches, marking a significant challenge to Elon Musk's SpaceX.

title: Kamala to break media silence in high-stakes interview, Trump adviser slams her for 'hiding behind Walz'
content: Vice President Kamala Harris will participate in her first interview since becoming the Democratic nominee, joined by Minnesota Governor Tim Walz. The interview will air on CNN, focusing on policy shifts, Harris's evolving positions, and concerns about Biden's mental health. Harris's media silence has been criticized, with some questioning the decision to tape the interview.
summary: Vice President Kamala Harris will participate in her first interview since becoming the Democratic nominee, joined by Minnesota Governor Tim Walz. The interview will air on CNN, focusing on policy shifts, Harris's evolving positions, and concerns about Biden's mental health. Harris's media silence has been criticized, with some questioning the decision to tape the interview.

title: Donald Trump hit with new indictment in 2020 election case
Telegram boss held over probe into child porn, drug trafficking on app
Muizzu says bid to topple govt, cites main bank's curbs on dollar spending
content: Authorities in the Maldives are investigating claims that President Mohamed Muizzu has faced attempted destabilization through financial discontent. The Bank of Maldives imposed foreign exchange limits, stirring online criticism and accusations of a plot. Reversing the restrictions, Muizzu suggested some bank directors remain loyal to the previous administration.
summary: Authorities in the Maldives are investigating claims that President Mohamed Muizzu has faced attempted destabilization through financial discontent. The Bank of Maldives imposed foreign exchange limits, stirring online criticism and accusations of a plot. Reversing the restrictions, Muizzu suggested some bank directors remain loyal to the previous administration.

title: Israeli military rescues hostage, father of 11, from Gaza tunnel in 'complex op'
content: Israel rescued Qaid Farhan Alkadi, an Arab Bedouin minority member, from an underground tunnel in Gaza. Alkadi, kidnapped during the October 7 Hamas attack, was held for 326 days. The rescue offers hope but reminds Israel of others still in captivity. Prime Minister Netanyahu emphasized ongoing military pressure and negotiations to free remaining hostages.
summary: Israel rescued Qaid Farhan Alkadi, an Arab Bedouin minority member, from an underground tunnel in Gaza. Alkadi, kidnapped during the October 7 Hamas attack, was held for 326 days. The rescue offers hope but reminds Israel of others still in captivity. Prime Minister Netanyahu emphasized ongoing military pressure and negotiations to free remaining hostages.

title: F-16s dent Russia's strike on Ukraine
content: Russia continued missile and drone attacks on Ukraine, killing at least six. President Zelensky confirmed Western-supplied F-16s intercepted some missiles. He called for more defense support following extensive strikes on Ukrainian infrastructure. Kyiv's air defenses reportedly neutralized all threats aimed at the city. The attacks appear to be in retaliation for Ukraine's incursion into Russia's Kursk region.
summary: Russia continued missile and drone attacks on Ukraine, killing at least six. President Zelensky confirmed Western-supplied F-16s intercepted some missiles. He called for more defense support following extensive strikes on Ukrainian infrastructure. Kyiv's air defenses reportedly neutralized all threats aimed at the city. The attacks appear to be in retaliation for Ukraine's incursion into Russia's Kursk region.

title: Delta plane tire explosion: Tragedy at maintenance facility leaves workers dead, investigation under way
content: A pre-dawn explosion erupted at Delta Air Lines' maintenance facility at Atlanta's Hartsfield-Jackson airport, claiming the lives of two workers and injuring a third. Occurring in the wheel and brake shop, the cause is yet to be determined. The incident did not disrupt airport operations, and investigations are underway.
summary: A pre-dawn explosion erupted at Delta Air Lines' maintenance facility at Atlanta's Hartsfield-Jackson airport, claiming the lives of two workers and injuring a third. Occurring in the wheel and brake shop, the cause is yet to be determined. The incident did not disrupt airport operations, and investigations are underway.

title: Northwestern University faces criticism over removal of Arab students' photos
content: Northwestern University’s medical school reportedly removed photos of Arab students wearing keffiyehs from social media, sparking a demand for a public apology and investigation by the Students for Justice in Palestine. The university cites student safety as the reason for the deletion. This incident follows earlier episodes of violence and discrimination against Palestinian students in educational settings.
summary: Northwestern University’s medical school reportedly removed photos of Arab students wearing keffiyehs from social media, sparking a demand for a public apology and investigation by the Students for Justice in Palestine. The university cites student safety as the reason for the deletion. This incident follows earlier episodes of violence and discrimination against Palestinian students in educational settings.
